name: Shields And Axes
body:
![Shileds And Axes logo](http://i69.fastpic.ru/big/2015/0624/b8/ce19a34b4413a6e16ac5c29b6132ddb8.png)

This project is my take on several fields of study simultaneously. Those are:
* C# programming, and more specifically, WPF technology
* Git as a mean to control my project
* GitHub as a collaboration and distribution system

***
"Shields And Axes" is a game of "Tic-tac-toe" using the viking theme. As of now, main application is fully functional. It supports 1 player vs. CPU and 2 player modes.
In planning for now is migration of the project to MVVM pattern (that should be interesting) and adding sounds (even more interesting).

***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
